channel.title: Projects on Portfolio website for Nicolas Bossers

item.title: index
item.description: GDP components over time and among countries: At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports). The GDP data we will look at is from the United Nationsâ€™ National Accounts Main Aggregates Database, which contains estimates of total GDP and its components for all countries from 1970 to today.

item.title: index
item.description: IMDB ratings: Differences between directors I would like you to explore whether the mean IMDB rating for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton are the same or not. I will run a hypothesis test and calculate the confidence intervals for the mean ratings of these two directors. Null and alternative hypothesis: H0: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is equal to zero H1: The difference in the mean IMDB ratings for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton is not equal to zero
